name: DiamondHold
description: DiamondHold is a BEP-20 token that builds upon the popular frictionless yield mechanic that is currently very popular on the Binance Smart Chain. It introduces the concept of a wallet ranking system, where any wallet that owns $DHOLD is ranked based on the time it has held these tokens (from first purchase date Starting at Tier 1 and eventually maturing into a Tier 4 wallet, these ranks determine the amount of tax a wallet incurs on a trade, and the reflection rewards gained by that wallet.
